story_10_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Tsk... Who do you kids think you are?
You have no right to be this good.
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
But don’t worry—my associates should be
arriving any minute now. I hope they
wipe those smiles off your faces...
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
You sure surprised me! The way you
drove off those mask-wearing scoundrels...
Your skills are certainly nothing to scoff at!
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
That was...incredible.
When did you get this strong?!
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Ah... I guess the obvious answer is that
you’ve been working harder than I have...
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Well, [Name:PlayerNickname ], I would like
nothing more than to be your next opponent...
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
but according to that lady, there are more
of those Team Break scoundrels skulking
around this area.
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Right! And we can’t just 
leave them to their own devices!
We should team up and stop them!
story_10_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Say, Hapu... If I beat those guys,
would you agree to battle me again?
story_10_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Well, sure! Of course I would!
But it sounds like they might have us
outnumbered. It won’t be an easy task.
story_10_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
H-hey! You’re not thinking of going off on your
own, are you?!
story_10_03000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m just gonna run ahead to scope out the area.
Don’t worry—I won’t do anything stupid.
story_10_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: Why’s he in such a rush all of a sudden...?
story_10_03000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Mmm... This is a tad bit worrying.
It may be a good idea to follow him.
